price: (47) They said, "Should we believe two men like ourselves while their people are for us in servitude?"
arabic: فَقَالُوٓاْ أَنُؤۡمِنُ لِبَشَرَيۡنِ مِثۡلِنَا وَقَوۡمُهُمَا لَنَا عَٰبِدُونَ

version.title: English Translation - Saheeh International
version.description: Translation of the Quran meanings into English - Saheeh International - Al-Muntada Al-Islami (Islamic Forum)

meta.transliteration: faqālū anu'minu libasharayni mith'linā waqawmuhumā lanā ʿābidūna
